title: Wall of Ice
tags: how to acquire wall of ice
content:
Wall of Ice Level 6 Evocation Spell 20~120 Damage 10d6Cold+10d6Cold (Conditional) Raise a wall of solid ice that deals 10∼60 Cold Damage to anyone standing in its way. When the ice is broken, it leaves behind a cloud of frigid air that deals 10∼60 Cold damage per turn to creatures within. 18m DEX Save Concentration Action Level 6 Spell Slot

Level 6 Evocation Spell

10d6Cold+10d6Cold (Conditional)

Raise a wall of solid ice that deals 10∼60 Cold Damage to anyone standing in its way.
